duties_responsibilities.duty: Uphold company health and safety policies and procedures at all times
Manage and develop solutions for remediation projects
Stay current in PFAS science, regulations, and treatment technologies. Provide technical input and leadership to TRC’s Western PFAS Initiative
Prepare proposals and estimates for various projects
Assist with project management including budgets, schedules, and client relations
Interface with local and state agencies

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Environmental, Chemical, or Civil Engineering, Geology, Chemistry, or a related field (Master's preferred)
Professional Engineering or Geologist (PE or PG) license, if applicable to field of study
